install.description: Thank you for installing the JoomlaWorks AllVideos Plugin for Joomla! 1.5

param.name: gzipScripts
param.label: Compress player scripts using PHP
param.description: Improve your site's performance when using AllVideos by enabling this option. It will compress and combine the javascript code required to make the various players supported by AllVideos work. This option may not be supported however by your hosting company, so in case you stumble onto any issues, you can safely turn it back to 'No'.

param.name: vfolder
param.label: Local Video Folder
param.description: This is the folder where you store all the video files that you want to stream/play from YOUR website. It is better if this folder is inside the 'images/stories' folder, so that you won't stumble into any permission issues. In this 'Local Video Folder' you can then upload video files of the following type: .flv, .swf, .mov, .mp4, .wmv, .divx

param.name: vwidth
param.label: Default width (in px) for videos
param.description: The preselected width of the video in pixels to show inside your content, it should be smaller than the width of the surrounding box -if any- in order not to break your layout!

param.name: vheight
param.label: Default height (in px) for videos
param.description: The preselected height of the video in pixels to show inside your content.

param.name: transparency
param.label: Player transparency for Flash based media
param.description: Should Flash based media be transparent or not? If you use any lightbox galleries, it's best to leave this option to 'Yes'.

param.name: background
param.label: Player background color for Flash based media
param.description: Set the background color of the player, only if the transparency is set to 'No'. Values should be given in hexadecimal format, e.g. #000000 for black.

param.name: backgroundQT
param.label: Player background color for QuickTime based media
param.description: Set the background color of the player for QuickTime based media like MOV, MP4 and 3GP.

param.name: controlBarLocation
param.label: FLV video player control bar location
param.description: Define where you want the controlbar of the player to appear.

param.name: lightboxLink
param.label: Enable lightbox popup ('dim lights' option) for all browsers except IE
param.description: Open videos in a lightbox popup. Set the width and height of the popup below. This option cannot currently work with IE browsers due to their lack of supporting web standards. An update with workarounds is planned for the next release of AllVideos.

param.name: afolder
param.label: Local Audio Folder
param.description: This is the folder where you store all the audio (sound) files that you want to stream/play from YOUR website. It is better if this folder is inside the 'images/stories' folder, so that you won't stumble into any permission issues. In this 'Local Audio Folder' you can then upload .mp3 and .wma audio file types!

param.name: awidth
param.label: Default width (in px) for audio player
param.description: The preselected width of the audio player in pixels to show inside your content, it should be smaller than the width of the surrounding box -if any- in order not to break your layout!

param.name: aheight
param.label: Default height (in px) for audio player
param.description: The preselected height of the audio player in pixels to show inside your content.

param.name: autoplay
param.label: Autoplay
param.description: Control audio/video autoplay when the page loads.

param.name: embedForm
param.label: Display embed box
param.description: Allow users to embed media to other websites. This option works for all media except local or remote Windows Media formats.

param.name: debugMode
param.label: Debug mode
param.description: Enable this option to display possible errors or other warnings. Useful for debugging.
